#id=1
#text=Every Sunday I check our pantry , fridge and freezer to see what I need to buy from the grocery store .
#id=2
#text=I also have to check the pet supplies as I have dogs and cats that eat a lot !
#id=3
#text=I carry a piece of paper with me and write down what I need to get .
#id=4
#text=I also have an idea of what meals I intend to cook during the week and what ingredients I will need to make those meals , so I add them to the list .
#id=5
#text=I know which store or stores I am going to visit and I know the layout of the store so I try and make my list in the same order that the items will be found once I get there .
#id=6
#text=I pick up a cart on the way into the store and head for the first aisle that I need to visit .
#id=7
#text=Most supermarkets have their frozen foods at one end so I start at the other end as it is best to buy frozen items last so they do n't start to melt while I 'm walking round the store .
#id=8

#text=I work my way through my shopping list , selecting items off the shelf and placing them into my cart , trying not to squash lighter things under heavy things and also making sure I buy items that have a use by date that is later than the day I intend to use them .
#id=9
#text=I am also keeping an approximate idea of how much everything costs so I have some idea of my total bill .
#text=When I am done with everything I wait at a checkout .
#text=There is nearly always someone in front of me but the checkout people work fast and I never wait for long .
#text=I place all my items on the conveyor belt and the person on the checkout counter scans them for prices .
#text=The prices all add up on a screen in front of me so I can see how much I am spending .
#text=While the checkout person scans my items another shop assistant packs all my items carefully into bags and places them back in my cart .
#text=When I am finished I am always asked if I need any help taking my bags to the car but I always refuse as I think other people in the store need help more than I do .
#text=I load the car and drive home and then have to put everything into the pantry , freezer or refrigerator .
#text=That is my least favorite part of grocery shopping !
